TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed D3DResourceType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifica i tipi di superficie Direct3D compatibili con la classe .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType> quando si assegna una superficie Direct3D il <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> metodo.
## Examples Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come specificare il <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType> in una chiamata al <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> metodo. Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [procedura dettagliata: Hosting di contenuto Direct3D9 in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md).
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage/CS/window1.xaml.cs#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType IDirect3DSurface9 = int32(0)
